Just like a rose,
so precious and rare,
is the forever friendship
the two of us share.

(?)(?)““““““(?)(?)“““(?)(?)““““(?)(?)“““““(?)(?)

Planted with kindness,
it's warmed by the sun
of caring and sharing,
laughter and fun.

(?)(?)“““(?)(?)“““““(?)(?)

It's grounded in trust
and nurtured by love,
with a sprinkling of grace
from God up above.

(?)(?)“““(?)(?)“““““(?)(?)

Tears of sadness and joy,
like dew,
renew this friendship
I share with you.

(?)(?)“““(?)(?)“““““(?)(?)
A blessing
of beauty unsurpassed,
our friendship's a flower
that will always last.!

Communication

LOVE GROWS WHERE THERE IS COMMUNICATION
TWO HEARTS SHARING COMMUNING BECOMES ONE. ITS A JOURNEY OF ENDLESS DISCOVERY BECAUSE JUST WHEN I THINK I ALREADY KNOW ALL THERE IS ABOUT YOU, YOU SURPRISE ME,LOVE KNOWS GOD IS NOT FINISH WITH YOU OR WITH ME.LOVES GROWS WHERE THERE IS COMMUNICATION

Always & Forever

For you I'd make the world turn,
For you my heart will always yearn.
For you I'd give my life at will,
For, you are the one who makes my heart stand still.

Without you, my life is dull,
Your smile warms my deepest soul.
Your laugh is like a thousand bells,
And when you laugh... my heart doth swell.

For every wave that finds the shore,
My heart loves you a thousand times more.
For every bird that sings it's song,
My love for you grows deep and strong.

Always and forever, I'll love you till I die,
And to you, my darling, I cannot lie.
For you, my heart, I'll always endeavor
To love you now, always... and forever.

FriendShip

FRIENDSHIP MEAN BEAUTY OF A HUMAN

FRIENDSHIP MEAN LIKE GOLDS

FRIENDSHIP MEAN FRESH FLOWER

FRIENDSHIP MEAN FEELING

FRIENDSHIP MEAN HAPPINESS

FRIENDSHIP MEAN PLEASED

FRIENDSHIP MEAN SHARING

FRIENDSHIP MEAN THINKING

FRIENDSHIP MEAN SUGGESTION

FRIENDSHIP MEAN CONNECTION

FRIENDSHIP MEAN WASTING TIME

FRIENDSHIP MEAN KILLER OF LIFE

FRIENDSHIP MEAN TEASING

FRIENDSHIP MEAN JOKING

FRIENDSHIP MEAN GOOD RELATIONSHIP

FRIENDSHIP MEAN GOOD PARTNER

FRIENDSHIP MEAN CALLING IN A SAVIOR CONDITION

FRIENDSHIP MEAN LEAVING IN A SAVIOR CONDITION

FRIENDSHIP MEAN LIVING IN A GOOD CONDITION

FRIENDSHIP MEAN TASTE THAN SUGAR ....

FRied$

Friends and friend ship...
its a package of feelings.,
nobody can make it.
nobody can delete it.
nobody can explain it.
only we can feel it.

Assalamu ‘alaykum wa rahmatullah!

Assalamu ‘alaykum wa rahmatullah!

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Life is a test. Islam is the best. Namaz is a must. Aakhirat is for rest. World is only dust. If QURAN is in the chest, nothing needs next. Obey ALLAH first. Success will be the next.

Islam mein uska koi hissa nahin jo NAMAZ na padhe. Namaz ke waqt duniya ki tamaam Rozi masjid me khinch li jati hai, aur hum log us waqt bahar rozi talaash karte hain. Namaz Mohammad Sallallahu alayhi wa sallam ki ankho ki thandak hai. Shaitan ka munh kaala karti hai. Jannat ki kunji hai. Allah se mangne ka zariya hai. 24 ghante me se hum agar 5 namaz ke liye 30 minute nahin nikal sakte to hum naam hi ke Musalman hain. Allah hum sab ko samajh de (aameen)!

PLEASE THINK TWICE.......

If ALLAH was to grant you 70 years of your life.....

You would spend:

24 years sleeping

14 years working

8 years in amusement

6 years at the dinner table

5 years in transportation

4 years in conversation

3 years in education

3 years in reading

3 years in watching TV

If you prayed 5 Times every day, you would be giving ALLAH 5 months of your life.

Can't we give 5 months out of 70 years?

Let's all give ALLAH a minimum of
5 months of our lives! (try)

May ALLAH Bless all of us.............[aameen]!

Miss You

A Little bit of you

And a little bit of me

Have a switched respective places

In a mystifying "we"

When miles come between us

And our lives are drawn apart,

Our thoughts remain together

Tugging softly at the heart.

This loneliness without you

Tell of the special moments shared

And says across the miles

Just how much we have always cared,

The emptiness that comes

With just the memory of your touch

Stirs a feeling from within that says,

"I miss you very much".

POEM

I want to close my eyes to past,
Hide into some abyss, deep and vast,
And lock the doors to disturbing winds,
That carries away my vows so fast.

I want to believe all my convictions were lies,
Those sentiments, those dreams in my eyes,
Those passions, desires, all were false,
I want to crush all my heart’s cries.

I want to condole myself by saying,
That you were truthful, honest and caring,
That you can never deceive or lie,
My heart aches to see you falling,

For I want, when I get exhaust,
With some integrity, I peep into my past,
When I chatted with you for long,
With dreams in eyes and bliss at heart.

3 things in life

Three Irrevocable things in the life are
- Word
- Time
and Chance

Three underniable things in the life are
- Serenity
- Honesty
and Hope

Three gems of the life are
- love
- Self-esteem
and True Friends

Three uncertaintly in the life are
- Dream
- Success
and Fate

Three things that deteriorate the life are
- Liquor
- Arrogance
and Anger

Kind hearts are the garden. Kind thoughts are the roots. Kind words are the blossoms. Kind deeds are the fruits.
